Question 48 
 
 
 
 
Measurement (NAT)
A 3½ digit rectifier type digital meter is set to read in its 2000 V range. A symmetrical square wave of 
frequency 50 Hz and amplitude 
±
 100 V is measured using the meter. The meter will read _______.
[2 Marks]
answer_text:
100 
Sol.
 
Rectifier type digital meter reads average value of signal. By default we consider full wave rectifier
